description:
Allow users to define filename patterns using variables like title, uploader, date, platform, and quality. Support automatic metadata tagging (ID3 for audio) with thumbnail embedding and track information.

**Rationale:** Power users need organized file naming schemes for large media libraries. Automated, consistent naming prevents manual renaming and helps with library management and searchability.
title: Custom filename templates and metadata tagging
